attributes.additional_details: Palestine, the gaza strip are running out of medical supplies, hospitals are getting bombed, more hospitals are getting crowded and they are running out of supplies. They have to perform operations without any pain killers due to the shortage.
attributes.background: Give medical supplies to palestine specifically the gaza strip,  if the border is still closed, use aircrafts to drop packages into gaza

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition: 
Increase aid and support for Palestinians: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648337
